messages.message: If descriptive metadata are available should include inside metadata/descriptive
If any other metadata are available, they MAY be included in separate sub-folders, for example an additional folder named other.
The recommended best practice is to always have a METS.xml in the representation folder.
The representation folder SHOULD include a sub-folder named metadata which MAY include all metadata about the specific representation.
There is no documentation folder in the representation folder minimal_IP_with_schemas/representations/rep1.
You have administrative files in the metadata/folder, you must have mets/amdSec in Root METS.xml
Individual representations should state their specific rights in their representation METS file (Root METS.xml)
You have files in SIP that are not referenced in Root METS.xml
Must have one structMap with the mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP'] in Root METS.xml doens't appear mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP'].
